clauses.title: Uptime Commitment
clauses.summary: AWS guarantees 99.9% uptime with service credits for downtime.

clauses.title: Data Residency
clauses.summary: Customer data must remain within the US data centers unless otherwise agreed.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.summary: Either party may terminate with 60 days written notice.

insights.message: Data residency limited to US regions may create compliance risks for EU operations.

evidence.snippet: AWS shall maintain at least 99.9% uptime; service credits apply for SLA breaches.
All customer data will be hosted exclusively within US-based data centers unless otherwise agreed in writing.
